Articles.Content:
I have a very rare bug with this module.
I build it by putting things inside normally:
http://prntscr.com/ptxkxz
and when I'm in space and decide to open the lid:
http://prntscr.com/ptxm1r
the strangest thing is that it happens to me alone with this ship. I already tried to accommodate things inside, take it out and place a new one, change several aspects of the ship's design. I don't know if the problem is the game or some mod.
Does anyone know what this may be due to? I don't know what to try.
